sentences.en: In order to arrest and temporarily imprison criminal suspects, the police have taken effective measures.
sentences.cn: 为了方便抓捕和寄押犯罪嫌疑人, 警方采取了有效的措施.

sentences.en: Kidnapping crime includes two concrete composing items : racketeered offense and illegal imprison offense.
sentences.cn: 绑架罪包含了两个具体构成要件,即敲诈勒索罪和非法拘禁罪.

sentences.en: Like the group that came to imprison Jesus.
sentences.cn: 像那群来捉拿耶稣的人.

sentences.en: Mantis Imprison – the mantis will channel - stun - lock the player that is Imprison Marked.
sentences.cn: MantisImprison—多节虫会引导眩晕效果到带有禁锢标记的玩家身上.

sentences.en: Many elderly people feel imprisoned in their own homes.
sentences.cn: 许多老年人感到待在自己家里跟坐牢一样。

sentences.en: Promote the freedom imprison them however. Make animal deteriorated, not well should nature development.
sentences.cn: 提倡自由却把它们囚禁起来. 使动物退化, 不适应自然发展.

sentences.en: Seat ring is progressively crimped on a lathe to imprison the O - ring in it.
sentences.cn: 在机床上,阀座密封环逐渐起波纹,并将O 形 环束缚在里面.

sentences.en: She was imprisoned within his strong arms.
sentences.cn: 她被他强壮的手臂搂着。

sentences.en: She will only be able to imprison one player at a time.
sentences.cn: 她一次只能禁锢一名玩家.

sentences.en: The government imprisoned all opposition leaders.
sentences.cn: 政府把反对派领导人全部监禁起来。

sentences.en: They won't imprison him for a first offence.
sentences.cn: 因为他是初犯,他们不会因此而监禁他.

sentences.en: Tort of keeping someone imprison wrongfully.
sentences.cn: 错误扣押某人的侵权行为.

sentences.en: Yet Herod chose this time to arrest Peter, to put him imprison, in bondage.
sentences.cn: 但是,希律王却选择在这个时候逮捕彼得, 把他关进了监狱,使他成为阶下囚.

sentences.en: You can lock up a person physically, but you cannot imprison his heart.
sentences.cn: 人的身体可以被囚禁, 人的心却不可以.

sentences.en: You may imprison my body, actually could not fetter my mind.
sentences.cn: 你可以禁锢我的身体, 却束缚不了我的心灵.

words.tran_cn: 应判徒刑的；可判徒刑的

trans.tran_en: to put someone in prison or to keep them somewhere and prevent them from leaving

trans.tran_cn: 关押，监禁，束缚，禁锢，使…不自由
